text: "Dance Like There's No Tomorrow" is a song by American singer and dancer Paula Abdul and American musician Randy Jackson. It was Abdul's first single release in twelve years. The song was produced by DEEKAY and Randy Jackson and appears on Jackson's album Randy Jackson's Music Club, Vol. 1 (2008). ==Chart performance== Chart (2008) Peak position Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 68 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 87 ==References== ==Other websites== * "Dance Like There's No Tomorrow" music video on YouTube Category:2008 songs Category:Paula Abdul songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:R&B; songs
title: Dance Like There's No Tomorrow
